ranges.help: default: all levels in RPA, 1:2*HOMO in QP and BSE; other options: factor,explicit

rpamax.help: only needed, if ranges is factor or explicit, number of levels in rpa

qpmin.help: only needed, if ranges is factor or explicit, lowest MO to be used in GW

qpmax.help: only needed, if ranges is factor or explicit, highest MO to be used in GW

bsemin.help: only needed, if ranges is factor or explicit, lowest MO to be used in BSE

bsemax.help: only needed, if ranges is factor or explicit, highest MO to be used in BSE

vxc.help: Exchange correlation functional computation for GW

scissor_shift.help: preshift unoccupied MOs by a constant for GW calculation

mode.help: use single short (G0W0) or self-consistent GW (evGW)

tasks.help: tasks to do gw,singlets,triplets or all

exctotal.help: maximum number of BSE states to calculate

ignore_corelevles.help: exclude core MO level from calculation on RPA,GW or BSE level, default=no
